hero_image.title: Hero image - Content & Media strategy
hero_image.description: Minimalistyczna kompozycja workspace z laptopem pokazującym dashboard content marketingu
hero_image.alt_text: Minimalistyczne biurko z laptopem wyświetlającym dashboard content marketingu i analytics
hero_image.prompt: Clean minimalist workspace flat lay view, laptop displaying content marketing dashboard with analytics charts and content calendar, white wooden desk, notebook with yellow pen, smartphone, coffee cup, natural daylight from window, muted colors black white gray with yellow accent, professional business aesthetic, high quality, sharp focus, no people

stock_suggestions.unsplash_query: content marketing workspace laptop dashboard analytics
stock_suggestions.style_notes: Minimalist workspace, clean composition, natural lighting, professional business aesthetic

section_media.title: Diagram customer journey z typami contentu
section_media.description: Flowchart pokazujący 3 etapy customer journey z przypisanymi typami treści
section_media.alt_text: Diagram customer journey: świadomość, rozważanie, decyzja z przypisanymi typami contentu
section_media.prompt: Clean horizontal flowchart diagram showing 3-stage customer journey: Awareness (blog articles, guides), Consideration (case studies, comparisons), Decision (testimonials, demos). Minimalist design, arrows connecting stages, icons for each content type, black and gray colors with yellow highlights, white background, professional infographic style

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Horizontal flowchart, clean design, professional business infographic style

section_media.title: Wykres wpływu jakości contentu na konwersje
section_media.description: Wykres słupkowy pokazujący różnice w konwersji między treściami podstawowymi a przemyślanymi
section_media.alt_text: Wykres porównania konwersji: treści podstawowe vs przemyślane treści w content marketingu
section_media.prompt: Clean bar chart comparing conversion rates: basic content (2-3%) vs strategic content (12-18%), professional infographic style, blue and yellow bars, clear labels in Polish, minimalist design, white background, business presentation style

stock_suggestions.unsplash_query: business growth chart conversion rate analytics
stock_suggestions.style_notes: Clean bar chart, professional business style, could be created with Canva or ChartJS

section_media.title: Infografika - Sesja profesjonalna vs zdjęcia stock
section_media.description: Porównanie kosztów i korzyści profesjonalnej sesji zdjęciowej vs zdjęć stockowych
section_media.alt_text: Infografika porównująca sesję fotograficzną i zdjęcia stockowe: koszty, jakość, unikalność
section_media.prompt: Split comparison infographic showing professional photo session vs stock photos. Left side: camera icon, 3-8k PLN cost, unique images. Right side: stock icon, 50 PLN per photo, generic look. Clean design, icons for each point, gray and yellow color scheme, professional layout

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Split comparison layout, use icons and clear cost breakdowns

section_media.title: Screenshot narzędzi content planowania
section_media.description: Interfejs narzędzia do planowania treści (Trello, Notion lub kalendarz content)
section_media.alt_text: Interfejs narzędzia do planowania contentu z kalendarzem publikacji i statusami artykułów
section_media.prompt: Clean screenshot mockup of content planning tool interface showing editorial calendar with article titles, publication dates, and status columns (draft, review, published), modern UI design, organized layout, highlighted important elements

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Clean interface design, organized layout, modern software UI aesthetic

section_media.title: Wykres ROI content marketingu w czasie
section_media.description: Wykres liniowy pokazujący wzrost ROI z content marketingu w perspektywie 12 miesięcy
section_media.alt_text: Wykres wzrostu ROI content marketingu przez pierwsze 12 miesięcy wdrażania strategii
section_media.prompt: Clean line chart showing content marketing ROI growth over 12 months, starting negative and becoming positive around month 6, reaching 300% ROI by month 12, professional business chart style, blue line with data points, gray background grid

stock_suggestions.unsplash_query: business growth chart timeline roi analytics
stock_suggestions.style_notes: Professional line chart showing growth over time, business presentation style

section_media.title: Porównanie modeli współpracy przy contencie
section_media.description: Tabela porównawcza outsourcing vs in-house z kosztami i korzyściami
section_media.alt_text: Tabela porównująca outsourcing i zatrudnienie in-house copywritera: koszty, korzyści, wady
section_media.prompt: Clean comparison table showing outsourcing vs in-house content creation. Two columns with icons, costs (3-5k PLN vs 8-12k PLN), pros and cons for each approach, professional infographic style, gray and yellow accents, organized layout

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Clean comparison table layout, professional business infographic style
